QuestData.Title: Piercing Talons and Slavering Jaws
QuestData.Description: First the hawks came. You've probably seen some of them circling up above.$b$bThe wolves came shortly after. I think they smelled my weakness.$b$bI'm not nearly as brave as Master Shang thought I was. The master will be quite cross with me if I don't do something about these beasts.$b$bCan... can you help, $gsir:ma'am;?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Thieving Plainshawks and 6 Thieving Wolves.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wish I were brave enough to fight them, but...
QuestData.RewardText: They... they're not stopping, but at least we fought back. Right?
